metadata.name: Consequences
metadata.description:
Everything we create is derived from time. As time passes by, we mingle with memories from the past, the moment we live in and our vision of the future.

The Entrapped memories are the representation of our inspirations, materialised by unknown forms of life, that seem to have been captured by other forces, far from the human reach. 

Each of these art pieces have at their core a video sequence auto-generated by a deep learning model that learned from what expresses the essence of Roman Kyn’s EP “Consequences”: the lyrics. 

The output is what animates the moving lights within the abstract forms.

-----

Far away, under the burning sun, hidden among the dunes
No matter the consequences, we become as dry as the desert
Our eyes looking at each other, with a fire burning inside
We can finally see the sun, reflecting in our hearts
